settings.title: Subscribe Today
settings.newsletter_text: Sales, new products and exclusive deals. Sign up to our newsletter and get them directly to your inbox.

settings.title: Customer Service Hours
settings.content:
Monday - Friday 

9 am - 5 pm EST

support@foxtrotpants.com

settings.newsletter_text: Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases and more …

settings.title: Page FAQ Template
settings.subtitle: Create an amazing FAQ page with a full-width banner

settings.title: TRX ELITE SERIES
settings.subtitle: Waterproof, Tear-proof, Life Proof. The Ultimate Tactical Pants

settings.content: View our over 2500+ customer reviews.

settings.title: tactical ready pockets
settings.text: Pockets specifically designed for Special Ops usage. However, we've designed these for a wide variety of activities. Hunting, Blue-Collar Work, or even Private Military.

settings.title: attention to detail
settings.text: Our Cordura® NYCO Tactical Nylon will be by far the highest quality fabric your hands feel. With our specific attention to detail, you'll be sure to have pants that you'll keep going back to everyday to wear.

settings.title: velcro fasteners
settings.text: You're strapped in, wether you're wearing work boots or combat boots, you'll be sure to have the perfect fit no matter your footwear.

settings.title: nanotechnology fabric
settings.text: Waterproof, Tear-proof, Knee pad insert slot. These are your new EDC go to pants. Side vents allow for air-flow to prevent excessive sweating. However, our pants are also fully moisture wicking.

settings.title: no matter the situation, we got you covered.
settings.text: Pockets for anything and everything. Foxtrot-TRX® Pants, The #1 Solution to all Tactical Requirements.

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.content:
Question: How long does it take to arrive?
Answer: Please allow up to 7 Business days for your Foxtrot-TRX® Pants to arrive.
Question: How many can I purchase at once?

Answer: We have discounts for bulk purchases, we allow up to 10 pants per customer at this current time.

Question: Are there any refunds? 

Answer: If the pants are worn and the labels removed, then no. If they are tried on but the labels remain on, and you don't want them, simply ship them back and we will exchange or refund your order completely for free.

settings.title: The Main Benefits
settings.text:
Saves Time: Allows you to move faster as compared to using a normal brush

More Efficient: Great for painting large surface areas such as walls and ceilings.

Saves money: No need to hire a professional painter. Paint your walls in minutes.

Safe to Use: No need for a ladder. Reach difficult areas safely with extension pole.

settings.title: Reasons To Paint Your Home
settings.text:
1) Increases the real estate value of the property.

2) Makes property more attractive and appealing.

3) Keeps dirt and dust to a minimum.

4) Hides stains and permanent marks.

5) Protects interior & exterior surfaces.

6) An inexpensive way to remodel.

settings.title: Is a roller better than an ordinary brush?
settings.text: A paint roller will turn your painting job into bliss. You will move faster as compared to a paintbrush and it will make the whole painting experiencing a less messy job.

settings.title: How do you wash it?
settings.text: To clean the water-based paints from the paint roller, you should wash it with warm water and soap before rinsing it clean.  If the water-based paint proves stubborn, you can use a lacquer thinner or mineral spirits. You should follow this with warm soapy water and rinse with clean water.

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.content:
Question: How big is the paint roller?

Answer: The paint roller frame is approximately 9" wide and 3" thick. The kit kit includes an extension pole that is great for painting ceilings and walls.

Question: Should the roller be pre-wetted before painting?

Answer: If you will be using latex paint, you should pre-wet the roller using water. Use a paper towel or rag to dab the excess liquid.

Question: Why is my paint roller sliding instead of rolling?

Answer: When you find your paint roller sliding rather than rolling, it’s a sign that you have overloaded it. It will also start to drip when you are moving it to the wall.

Question: What causes my paint roller to splatter?

Answer: While overloading the roller with paint is the main cause of splattering, this can also be caused by using the wrong equipment for the wrong areas. The paint roller isn’t supposed to be used in tight corners and edges.

Question: Does a paint roller use more paint than a brush?

Answer: A roller has a porous surface that holds more paint and distributes it evenly and faster. This can help you save on paint.

settings.title: Benefits of a Folding Chair
settings.text:
Comfortable: Ergonomically designed, well cushioned seating.

Lightweight: Easy to carry around. Fits right in your bag.

Durable: Built to last long. Will not deform or lose shape.

Foldable: Folds up into a fraction of it's size to save space.

settings.title: What is a folding chair?
settings.text: A foldable camping chair is a light and portable chair that can be folded flat to a small size. This makes it easy to carry around and use in temporary sitting requirements.

settings.title: Why do I need one?
settings.text: You can imagine a situation where you are out in the wild camping and you have nowhere to sit because there is dew on the grass. Without a portable chair, you might be forced to sit on the grass, stone, or log. You can save yourself from such inconveniences by acquiring a portable camping chair when going hiking or camping.

settings.title: What material is it made from?
settings.text: The chair is made from aluminum and steel. This is because both materials are durable and strong. While they have almost equal strength, you should take note that aluminum chairs are usually lighter.

settings.title: How much weight can it hold?
settings.text: After years of manufacturing and rigorous testing, our chairs are now capable of withstanding an average weight of 250 to 300 pounds.

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.content:
Question: Can I lean back in it?

Answer: The chair is built to withstand any weight so you can lean on it as much as you want.

Question: How do I clean it?

Answer: The metal can be wiped down and the fabric can be removed easily for washing.

Question: How do I store it?

Answer: The chair folds up and fits in a pouch for easy storage.

settings.title: Benefits of a Bug Zapper
settings.text:
Effective: Eliminates insects in your home with zero hassle.

Chemical Free: No chemicals required. Keep your environment safe.

Fun Design: Unique design resembles the shape of a tennis racket.

Portable: Completely wireless. Use it on your patio or camping trips

Rechargeable: Use it remotely. Up to 3 and a half hours of battery life

Easy To Clean: Comes apart easy for cleaning.

settings.title: What is an electric bug zapper?
settings.text: Also referred to as an electric insect killer, this is a device that uses ultra violet waves to attract flying insects and kill them. The outer grid contains big holes through which mosquitoes and other insects enter. When they touch the inner grip, it causes a short circuit and they get electrocuted.

settings.title: How do you clean it?
settings.text: To clean you your zapper, you simply need to remove the collection tray and empty it in the trash. You can also use a mild vacuum cleaner to get remaining debris.

settings.title: Is it safe for my family and pets?
settings.text: The UVA rays produced by a bug zapper have no harmful effects on humans and pets. Toddlers and pets don’t react negatively to the sound produced by a bug zapper. But if your pet reacts negatively, you can always switch off the zapper and relocate it away from the pet.

settings.title: How long should I have it on?
settings.text: For the best results when using a bug zapper, it is recommended that you leave it working 24/7. This will break the insect breeding so you never half to deal with them in your home again.

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.content:
Question: Which insects does the bug zapper kill?

Answer: The bug zapper is most effective with flying insects such as flying ants, moths, wasps, mosquitoes, midges, and flies.

Question: How much electricity does it use?

Answer: It uses very minimal electricity. On average, a large bug zapper will consume less than 100 watts when you leave it on the whole night.

Question: What is the best outdoor location for it?

Answer: It is advisable to place the bug zapper at an area that is at least one and a half meters high. Place the zapper at least 2 meters away from your sitting location.

Question: Can it be used in the rain?

Answer: Like other electrical appliances, it wouldn’t be advisable to put the zapper under direct rain. This could cause it to short, tripping the circuit breaker.

settings.title: The Benefits
settings.text:
Portable: Take it anywhere with you.

Affordable: Cost efficient. Cheaper than traditional air conditioner.

Efficient: Energy efficient. Save on utility costs.

Compact: Small, does not require a lot of space.

Quiet: Quiet motor. Makes very little sound.

settings.title: What is a mini air conditioner?
settings.text: A mini air condition is a small and mobile air conditioner that doesn't require permanent installation like the central air conditioning units or the windows through-wall units. Our mini air conditioner is lightweight and portable and is a perfect choice for any small room.

settings.title: Does it need to vent?
settings.text: Our air cooler offers ventless air conditioning. It does not require a hose and is completely portable. It uses the power of evaporation and does not require any harmful chemicals.

settings.title: How loud is it?
settings.text: The noise produced by this unit isn’t loud, but if you’re used to sleeping or living in a quiet room, it can be a noticeable addition of white noise. For some people, this actually works well: babies can often sleep better when there’s white noise in the background that mimics the echoed sounds of the womb.

settings.title: What happens to the moisture?
settings.text: A portable air conditioner works by pulling heat and moisture from the air. Therefore, you may be wondering where this water goes. Our mini air conditioning unit comes with a self-evaporating technology that processes the moisture before evaporating it and exhausting it through the back of the unit. If your area is very humid, this water will collect in a reservoir located at the back of the unit.

settings.title: Does It Need To Be Drained?
settings.text: Our portable air conditioner comes with a built-in condensation exhaust system that gets rid of water that collects during the cooling or dehumidification process. The moisture is then released through evaporation.

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.content:
Question: Can it be used as a dehumidifier?

Answer: Yes, you can use it as a dehumidifier. You will be getting both an air conditioner and a dehumidifier in one.

Question: How safe is it to leave it on at night?

Answer: Our mini air conditioner is as safe as any other electrical device and can be safely left on at night. It’s advisable to ensure that the portable air conditioner has a dedicated plug.

Question: How much electricity does it consume?

Answer: The mini ac unit is rated as 5V.  How it consumes electricity will depend on the temperature you will set it at.

settings.title: What Is A Running Bag?
settings.text: A running bag, also known as a waist belt is a special belt that has a pouch for you to keep your smartphones, keys, water bottles, passports, cash, and other accessories. The role of the pouch is to keep your belongings safe, organized, and hands-free as you run, jog, or exercise.

settings.title: Why do I need one?
settings.text: If you've ever struggled with finding a safe place to keep your phone while exercising, a running bag will eliminate that problem, so you always have a safe place to keep your belongings.

settings.title: How do you wear a running bag?
settings.text: Wearing a running bag is easy.  Just put it around your waist or the belly line. If necessary, you can make adjustments. Avoid wearing it too low like around the hips as it can affect your running strides or even cause you to slip.

settings.title: Which way should it face?
settings.text: Depending on what you are doing, you can have the main storage pouch in front or at the back. For instance, if you are cycling, you may need to maintain a bending position and you should, therefore, place the storage pouch at the back. If you are a runner, you should place it in front of your body. Besides, when you place things like water bottles in front, you will have easy access to them.

settings.title: Will it slow me down?
settings.text: The belt will not slow you down while running. It's made of lightweight and comfortable material that is comfortable to wear. Our running bags are mostly made for runners, and are, therefore, designed to meet all your running needs.

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.content:
Question: Is the zipper durable?

Answer: Our waist belt has been made to withstand the harsh conditions that workout gears go through. No matter what you use it for, the zipper will remain in good condition.

Question: Does the running bag bounce?

Answer: Our running bag comes in an intuitive design that helps to ensure no bounce occurs. As long as you secure it nicely and snugly, it will also not shift, ride up, or slide down.

Question: Will your running bag fit me?

Answer: Our running belt is adjustable and will, therefore, fit the majority of adults as long as they have a waist of 70 cm to 120 cm.

Question: What material is the running bag made from?

Answer: Our running bag is made of synthetic materials that are similar to the materials commonly used in the fitness industry. The materials are durable, breathable, and easy to clean.

Question: Does it make your phone moist when running?

Answer: The running bag is made of waterproof material. No matter how much you sweat during your workout, it will not make your phone wet. Even if it rains during your run, the water will not reach your phone.

Question: Does the running bag lose elasticity?

Answer: Our waist belt is made of a strong and durable material that can withstand regular stretching without losing their elasticity.

Question: What size phones does it fit?

Answer: Our running bag can fit a six-inch mobile phone.

settings.title: Benefits of a Car Seat HeadRest
settings.text:
Comfortable: Provides comfortable place for passengers to rest their head during long car rides.

Adjustable: Adjust the height and width of the pillow to meet the passenger’s needs.

Compact: Occupies little space. Easy to carry around.

High-Quality: Made from breathable, sweat-proof leather material.

Easy To Assemble: Takes less than 5 minutes to set up. Instruction manual included.

settings.title: What is a car seat headrest?
settings.text: A car seat headrest is an adjustable headrest that provides passengers with proper head and neck support during long car rides.

settings.title: Is it worth installing?
settings.text: Installing headrests in your car will ensure your passengers are comfortable at all times. If you often see passengers leaning their head against the window or hanging their head forward, this head rest will eliminate that problem and keep their neck straight at all times.

settings.title: Is the headrest adustable?
settings.text: You can adjust the width between the two headrests by selecting the slot position on the telescopic support rod (minimum distance between the two pillows: 10.63 inches). The pillows can also be raised, lowered and rotated to accommodate various heights. If not needed, just lift them up to save space inside the car.

settings.title: Can it be used in the drivers seat?
settings.text: Absolutely. Our neck pillow is good for the drivers seat too. All you have to do is adjust the angle. We recommend you adjust the angle to about 100 degrees so that it is almost straight.

settings.title: What material is it made from?
settings.text: The car seat headrest is made from 100% pure-cut memory foam. The pads act as a cushion and feature a leather pillowcase cover that is easy to clean.

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.content:
Question: What is the best sleep position for using this car seat pillow?

Answer: The car seat pillow is ideally suited for people tilting their head to the side.

Question: Can the headrest be used on all vehicles?

Answer: All car models come with the same standard adjustable headrest. As long as your vehicle has a removable and adjustable headrest lever with a bar distance that is more than 3.75 inches, this neck pillow will fit well.

Question: Can the car seat pillow offer support to a 6ft person?

Answer: Yes. The height of the car seat pillow can be adjusted to fit your needs. Therefore, it will comfortably serve a 6 ft adult.

Question: How thick is the cart seat pillow?

Answer: The car seat headrest has a thickness of four inches.

settings.title: What is a cake mold?
settings.text: A cake mold is a piece of bakeware used to make adorable cakes. The cake mold you see here features a beautiful swirl design made of silicone that can safely be used in an oven, fridge, or dishwashers.

settings.title: What is it made of?
settings.text: The cake mold is made of silicone. Silicone is flexible and does not stick. Traditional metal and glass cake molds require oil and baking paper to prevent sticking, whereas silicone cake molds release cake easily.

settings.title: How is it cleaned?
settings.text: The cake mold can be cleaned with warm water, dish soap and a scrubbing brush.  Rinse the swirl cake maker while feeling if there is any residue left. If there is any sticky film, you can clean it off using baking soda.

settings.title: What temperature can it handle?
settings.text: This cake mold is tolerant of both hot and cold temperature. This means you can use it at a temperature of up to 446 degrees, and you can put it directly in the fridge right after.

settings.title: Can it be used directly on an oven rack?
settings.text: Yes, the cake mold can be put directly on an oven rack. However, you may want to it on a cookie sheet to ensure it bakes evenly.

settings.title: Talk about your brand
settings.content:
Question: Does the interior need to be greased?

Answer: It's not necessary to grease this interior. But if you want to keep it completely clean, you can spray a bit of cooking spray inside.

Question: Is the bottom of the mold smooth or textured?

Answer: The cake mold has a smooth and non-textured bottom. It doesn't melt in the oven and will bake like a metal baking pan.

Question: Does it brown the cakes?

Answer: Yes, it will brown the cakes evenly and cook the dough thoroughly.

Question: What is the inside dimension of the cake mold?

Answer: The swirl cake maker has an inside dimension of 200 mm.

Question: What is the height of the side of the cake mold?

Answer: It has a height of approximately 60 mm.

settings.title: What Is a Jellyfish Lamp?
settings.text: A jellyfish lamp is a desk lamp that consists of animated jellyfish that simulate natural marine life and create a peaceful atmosphere in your home or office.

settings.title: What Are The Benefits?
settings.text:
Ultra-Calming: Provides visually relaxing experience.

Stylish Design: Will improve the décor of your room.

Super Quiet: Extremely quiet motor. Ideal for sleeping.

Fascinating Colors: Features 5 LED color options. Fun to watch.

Very Realistic: Looks identical to real jellyfish.

settings.title: How Does It Work?
settings.text: The Aquarium uses LED lights, water, and a motor that allows the silicone jellyfish to look almost life-like. The lamp's outer shell is Acrylic and not glass, so it will not shatter if dropped. The LED colors can be set to one color or to a multi-color changing mode.

settings.title: What Do I Fill It With?
settings.text: You can use either distilled water or tap water. However, it’s advisable to use distilled water as tap water will get murky with time. This is because of the impurities that are common in tap water.

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.content:
Question: Is it hot to touch?

Answer: The fish lamp doesn’t get hot. Therefore, it will not burn your hand when touching it.

Question: Can you set the light to one color?

Answer: Yes, you can set the light to one steady color, a different selection of colors, or to cycle through different colors. 

Question: Is the movement of jellyfish effected by light?

Answer: No, changing the light will not This will not affect the movement of the jellyfish.

Question: Does the lamp make noise?

Answer: No, the lamp is super quiet and very smooth. This makes it a perfect choice for bedrooms.

Question: How long does it stay on?

Answer: It will turn off automatically after 4 hours.

settings.title: What is a oil bottle dispenser?
settings.text: An oil bottle dispenser is a dispenser made of high-quality glass and food-grade ABS that is designed with a measuring cup at the top so you can dispense the exact amount of cooking oil, olive oil, vinegar or soy sauce with just a press of a button, before pouring!

settings.title: How does it work?
settings.text: The oil bottle dispenser incorporates a specialized pump system that siphones the exact amount of oil you need for preparing meals. Once the button is pressed, oil is drawn through the suction tube and into the measuring cup for pouring.

settings.title: How much liquid can it hold?
settings.text: The main container is about 25cm high and can hold 500ml of liquid. The measuring cup located at the top of the unit can store 20ml of liquid, 2 teaspoons, or 1.5 tablespoons.

settings.title: How do you clean it?
settings.text: Mix warm water with dishwashing liquid and pour the mixture into the bottle and measuring cup. Scrub the inside with a scrub brush until the residue is gone and rinse with warm water.

settings.title: What is the bottle made from?
settings.text: The dispenser is made of high-quality glass and food-grade ABS meaning it is safe to use for all your liquids. The glass base is dishwasher safe and easy to disassemble.

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.content:
Question: Can I put other liquids in the dispenser?

Answer: Yes, the bottle can be used with various liquids including lemon juice, vinegar, wine, sauces, etc.

Question: Will the dispenser leak?

Answer: The dispenser is sturdily-made to ensure zero leakage .

Question: Where are the measurement markings located?

Answer: If you are worried about the markings coming into contact with the oil, you don't have to fear anymore as the bottle is marked on the outside.

Question: What are the dimensions of the oil dispenser?

Answer: The bottle has a height of 28.5 cm and a width of 7.5 cm. It can be used to hold 500 ml of liquid.

settings.title: What is a diaper bed backpack?
settings.text: A diaper bed backpack is essentially a backpack that expands into a full-out baby bed, so you can change your baby's diapers on-the-go. The backpack also stores all your baby essentials so you have access to them whenever you need.

settings.title: Why do I need one?
settings.text: The baby bed backpack is a must-have item for all mothers because it provides a safe and convenient place to change diapers. No more public restrooms and shared diaper changing stations.

settings.title: What material is it made of?
settings.text: The diaper bed backpack is made of strong—durable polythene material. It also has an insulated area that can be used for storing baby food and water bottles.

settings.title: Does it come with stroller straps?
settings.text: Yes, on top of the comfortable shoulder straps, it has two hook belts that enable you to secure the bag onto a stroller or shopping cart.

settings.title: Is the bag washable?
settings.text: Absolutely! Both the fabric and the foam parts of the bag are separable and machine washable. If your baby formula spills in the bag, you don't have to worry as the diaper bed backpack bed has a vinyl lining that makes it easy to clean.

settings.title: What is the age limit of the bag?
settings.text: The diaper bed backpack is suitable for babies between 0 and 8 months old, or until the baby can crawl. Once the baby is older the bag might be too small.

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.content:
Question: Does the baby bed backpack come with a mattress?

Answer: Yes. The unit comes with a soft and comfortable mattress for your baby to lay on.

Question: How big is the baby bed backpack?

Answer: The exact dimensions of the baby bed backpack are 30cm long x 18 cm wide and 50 cm high.

Question: Can the baby bed be used as a play area?

Answer: Yes. The baby bed can be used as a play area for your baby. You can also use it as a crib for your baby to sleep in.

Question: What material are the milk pockets made of?

Answer: The milk bottle pockets are made of an aluminum foil thermal insulation to maintain temperature.

Question: How large are the front pocket?

Answer: The diaper bed backpack comes with front pockets that are big enough to accommodate three bottles of milk or water.

settings.title: What is a super flashlight?
settings.text: A super flashlight is a flashlight that produces more than 500 lumens. It is specifically made to illuminate long and extremely dark areas.

settings.title: How far can it reach?
settings.text: The light from the flashlight can reach 500 meters. The flashlight also features an adjustable zoom that can be used to illuminate objects in both short and long-range.

settings.title: How is it powered?
settings.text: The super flashlight is powered by a removable—rechargeable battery that can be recharged anywhere via USB cable, so long as long as you have access to a power outlet or USB port. Once fully charged the battery will last you 8 - 12 hours.

settings.title: Is it safe to use?
settings.text: The super flashlight is completely safe to use, but it does get hot after running for a while; therefore it is advisable to avoid placing the flashlight on combustable material when hot.

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.content:
Question: What modes does the flashlight have?

Answer: The super flashlight features low, medium, high, strobe, and SOS modes.

Question: How long does the bulb last?

Answer: Tests done on the flashlight conclude that the bulb will last you more than 100,000 hours.

Question: Is the flashlight durable?

Answer: The flashlight is made of aluminum and can withstand falls up to 2 meters, making it extremely durable.

Question: Is the flashlight waterproof?

Answer: Yes, the super flashlight is IPX8 rated and can, therefore, be used under heavy rains.

Question: Does it work in the fog?

Answer: When set on high, the super flashlight works very well in the fog.
